comment: Thick accent, fast pace, teaches the more difficult way to do things.

not a great professor unless you already know the material. He makes easy concepts very complicated and is down right confusing at times. In lectures, he skips around and doesn't make clear points. I would not recommend him unless you have a very strong math background.

Probably the worst teacher I've ever had. 90% of the class probably would've failed but he said if we pass the final then we pass the class. He randomly put Calc II on a test in the Calc I class. If you ask him to explain something, he just points to the board. His test are insane. Do not take this teacher or else you will regret it.

He is one of the worse teachers in the mathematics department. I  have a 3.8 and I had to withdrawal from his class because it was just ridiculous. He doesn't explain the material and if you ask a question he doesn't answer it but mumbles and points. I wouldn't take him had I known. His accent didn't help it either.
worst professor ever, poor teaching ability and study guides to not mirror exams, hard to understand, knows material but cannot teach it

He's a nice guy. Hard to understand at  because of his accent. In the first two weeks he checks attendance. I dont recommend skipping class because he gives out hw sheets randomly which get graded. He doesnt teach with the book. He doesnt check hw from the book either. The study guides are useless..they dont reflect what is on the tests.

His accent is strong but I could understand fine. He doesn't use the book much but does a lot of examples in class. Tests are a little difficult but he dropped one and let us make up are next lowest grade for a better one. Not terrible but if you have a hard time paying attention in math, don't take his class.

Accent not a problem and is a nice guy who knows the subject matter well but is a poor teacher. Not very good at teaching the subject and test are very difficult in relation to what is covered in class.

Very hard to understand his accent, therefore i had to drop his class to get a better teacher next semester. Textbook is only used for practice work which he doesn't check. Also when he's explaining how to do a problem he'll skip through a lot of steps making it confusing. Attendance is checked everyday.
